name: Queen
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose a <Animal Kingdom Pirates> except for Queen and add it to your hand, put the remaining to the bottom of the deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose a <Animal Kingdom Pirates> except for Queen and add it to your hand, put the remaining to the bottom of the deck in any order.
